message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can only pay $10000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're looking to get a good deal, but I believe the product is worth more than $10000 to you. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $11500. I think this is a fair compromise, considering the value you'll get from the product.

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $10750 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the value I see in it.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to find a mutually beneficial price. However, I'm still not willing to go below $12000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $11800. I believe this is the best compromise considering the value you'll get from the product.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate. Considering the value I see in the product, I would like to propose a price of $11500. I believe this is a fair compromise given our previous discussions.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to find a mutually beneficial price. However, I'm still not willing to go below $12500. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $12200. I believe this is the best compromise considering the value you'll get from the product.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts to reach a compromise. Given the value I place on the product, I would like to propose a price of $12000. This seems like a reasonable midpoint between our previous offers.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I understand that we're getting close to a deal, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for less than $12500. I'm willing to make one final concession and offer it to you for $12400. I believe this is the best compromise considering the value you'll get from the product.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your final offer. Considering the value I see in the product, I would like to propose a price of $12300. I believe this is a fair compromise given our negotiations thus far.
